trans-unit.source: In the portal, go to **New**, then **Networking**.
trans-unit.target: In the portal, go to **New**, then **Networking**.

trans-unit.source: Select **Virtual network gateway** from the list.
trans-unit.target: Select **Virtual network gateway** from the list.

trans-unit.source: Gateway
trans-unit.target: Gateway

trans-unit.source: On the **Create virtual network gateway** blade **Name** field, name your gateway.
trans-unit.target: On the **Create virtual network gateway** blade **Name** field, name your gateway.

trans-unit.source: This is not the same as naming a gateway subnet.
trans-unit.target: This is not the same as naming a gateway subnet.

trans-unit.source: It's the name of the gateway object.
trans-unit.target: It's the name of the gateway object.

trans-unit.source: Next, choose the virtual network that you want to deploy this gateway to.
trans-unit.target: Next, choose the virtual network that you want to deploy this gateway to.

trans-unit.source: Click the arrow to open the **Choose a virtual network** blade, and then click the VNet.
trans-unit.target: Click the arrow to open the **Choose a virtual network** blade, and then click the VNet.

trans-unit.source: In order for the VNet to appear in the list, it must already have a valid gateway subnet.
trans-unit.target: In order for the VNet to appear in the list, it must already have a valid gateway subnet.

trans-unit.source: Choose a public IP address.
trans-unit.target: Choose a public IP address.

trans-unit.source: Click the arrow to open the **Choose public IP address blade**.
trans-unit.target: Click the arrow to open the **Choose public IP address blade**.

trans-unit.source: Then click **Create New** to open the **Create public IP address blade**.
trans-unit.target: Then click **Create New** to open the **Create public IP address blade**.

trans-unit.source: Input a name your public IP address.
trans-unit.target: Input a name your public IP address.

trans-unit.source: Note that this is not asking for an IP address.
trans-unit.target: Note that this is not asking for an IP address.

trans-unit.source: The IP address will be assigned dynamically.
trans-unit.target: The IP address will be assigned dynamically.

trans-unit.source: Rather, this is the name of the IP address object that the address will be assigned to.
trans-unit.target: Rather, this is the name of the IP address object that the address will be assigned to.

trans-unit.source: Click **OK** to save your changes.
trans-unit.target: Click **OK** to save your changes.

trans-unit.source: For **Gateway type**, select the Gateway type that is specified for your configuration.
trans-unit.target: For **Gateway type**, select the Gateway type that is specified for your configuration.

trans-unit.source: For **VPN type**, select the VPN type that is specified for your configuration.
trans-unit.target: For **VPN type**, select the VPN type that is specified for your configuration.

trans-unit.source: For **Subscription**, verify that the correct subscription is selected.
trans-unit.target: For **Subscription**, verify that the correct subscription is selected.

trans-unit.source: For **Resource Group**, the resource group is determined by the Virtual Network that you select.
trans-unit.target: For **Resource Group**, the resource group is determined by the Virtual Network that you select.

trans-unit.source: For **Location**, make sure it's showing the location that both your Resource Group and VNet exist in.
trans-unit.target: For **Location**, make sure it's showing the location that both your Resource Group and VNet exist in.

trans-unit.source: You can select **Pin to dashboard** if you want your gateway to appear on the dashboard.
trans-unit.target: You can select **Pin to dashboard** if you want your gateway to appear on the dashboard.

trans-unit.source: Click **Create** to being creating the gateway.
trans-unit.target: Click **Create** to being creating the gateway.

trans-unit.source: You'll see the "Deploying Virtual network gateway" tile on the dashboard.
trans-unit.target: You'll see the "Deploying Virtual network gateway" tile on the dashboard.

trans-unit.source: Creating a gateway can take up to 45 minutes.
trans-unit.target: Creating a gateway can take up to 45 minutes.

trans-unit.source: There is a lot going on in the background.
trans-unit.target: There is a lot going on in the background.

trans-unit.source: You may need to refresh your portal page to see the completed status.
trans-unit.target: You may need to refresh your portal page to see the completed status.

trans-unit.source: After the gateway is created, you can view the IP address that has been assigned to it by looking at the virtual network in the portal.
trans-unit.target: After the gateway is created, you can view the IP address that has been assigned to it by looking at the virtual network in the portal.

trans-unit.source: The gateway will appear as a connected device.
trans-unit.target: The gateway will appear as a connected device.

trans-unit.source: You can click on the connected device (your virtual network gateway) to view more information.
trans-unit.target: You can click on the connected device (your virtual network gateway) to view more information.
